law.catch_line: Access to religious publications or instructional materials.
law.text:
Subject to restrictions for violations of rules, any inmate of a facility operated by or under contract to the department who requests religious publications or other religious instructional materials may receive them provided:
They have been purchased by or donated to the inmate; or
Donated to the institution for use by inmates; and
Do not constitute a threat to the security of the institution.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 606, sec. 133, effective July 15, 1998.
